title: The Fruit of the Spirit: Joy
description:
Readings from:

Psalm 33:1-4

Habakkuk 3:17-18

Romans 15:13

Philippians 4:4

1 Peter 4:12-13

Today's passages were read by Andrea Greening, a nurse in Champaign, Illinois who also serves on the Board of Directors for A Just Brew, a nonprofit coffeeshop that gives 100% of its profit to International Justice Mission, the world's largest anti-slavery organization.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
